pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Comprehensive Collection of Health and Human Motion Datasets // Provides a broad collection of datasets focused on health, biomechanics, and human motion. It includes clinical, physiological, and kinematic information from diverse sources, covering aspects such as surgery outcomes, vital signs, rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis, accelerometry, gait analysis, motion sensing, and biomechanics experiments. Designed for researchers, analysts, and students, the package facilitates exploration and analysis of data related to health monitoring, physical activity, and rehabilitation.
